Posts.Content: May 3, 2016 06:54PM mselli wrote: I had surgery almost a month ago (April 7th), and agree that it feels like I'm wearing an iron bra. I wonder sometimes if I'm doing my exercises enough, but I try to do them about 3 times a day. Lots of discomfort tho.
